meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the sunflower family, native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The liatris blooms beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I planted a liatris in my backyard last spring.
meanings.sent3: The liatris decided to show off its colorful petals to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The liatris stood tall among the other plants, like a proud king.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the liatris brightened up the whole yard.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Liatris.
meanings.sent1: She admired the liatris growing by the fence.
meanings.sent2: The liatris added a touch of elegance to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn under the liatris.
meanings.sent4: The liatris stood out in the garden like a beacon of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the liatris danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The common name for Liatris spicata, also known as blazing star or gayfeather.
meanings.sent1: The liatris spicata attracts butterflies with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: I love the way the liatris spicata brightens up the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to nibble on the liatris spicata but quickly regretted it.
meanings.sent4: The liatris spicata stood tall like a fiery torch in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the liatris spicata filled the air with sweetness.
